snippet: Detainees in pretrial detention centers will be forbidden to use slang known as “fenya,” but there was no immediate indication of how the authorities intended to enforce the rule.
abstract: Russia bans traditional vulgar slang known as 'fenya' in its prisons as part of ongoing effort to reform old gulag system; move follows similar ban on swearing in arts without appropriate labeling, impacting Russia's long tradition of colorful, nuanced cursing.
lead_paragraph: Detainees in pretrial detention centers will be forbidden to use slang known as “fenya,” but there was no immediate indication of how the authorities intended to enforce the rule.

headline.main: New Prison Rule in Russia: No Swearing
headline.print_headline: New Prison Rule in Russia: No Swearing
